author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PILAR COULD PRODUCE FLASH FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL  AMERICA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary:
...PILAR COULD PRODUCE FLASH FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL  AMERICA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
 As of 4:00 AM CDT Tue Oct 31
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.4, -90.4
 with movement ENE at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Pilar (EP4/EP192023)
